Summary: friend looks,points to show me,its gone.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Dola
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsA friend and i were having a garage sale,but nobody was showing up.So we just started taking pictures.My frind looked across my pond,took a picture,looked at the picture.then up at the sky.She saw the UFO,then pointed to show me,but it was gone.We didnt know what it was when we first sawe it.We couldnt hear it and havnt seen it since.We were at my house,Dola Ohio.During the sightning she looked suprised.After it.i was shocked,and we just kinda sat there,looking around the sky to see if we saw it.We lost sight of it because my friend looked at me to show me where it was at,looked up&it was gone.
